name: Star Keeper (itch)
description:
You need to collect all 5 stars and make it to the door within 60 seconds to make it to the next level. There are currently 3 main levels.

Controls: "A/D" = move, "Space" = Jump, "ESC" = Quit.

This game was made in 3 hours in the Godot engine for Trijam #105 with the theme "Islands" 

Assets Used In Project: https://that-gray-guy.itch.io/simple-black-and-white-tiles, https://meowmeowexpress.itch.io/easy-tileset, https://vectorpixelstar.itch.io/1-bit-icons-part-2, https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style, https://opengameart.org/content/platform-small-sound-effect-pack, https://tepokato.itch.io/axolotl-font.
